covers.title: 🎤 Riko's Cover Songs & Archive
covers.description: Enjoy Riko's music all in one place! 💚

description.1: From the many singing broadcasts Riko has done,
description.2: only those reuploaded as YouTube VODs
description.3: are organized here. Please check the separate cover collection page for cover songs. 🎶

preview.declaration:
Princess Riko of the Stellachiko Kingdom
hereby grants knighthood
to those who pledge their loyalty and devotion.
preview.oath:
I hereby pledge to always support Princess Riko's streams and accompany her on her journey.
I vow to be her shield during difficult times and share her joy during happy moments.
As a member of the order of knights, I promise to foster camaraderie and uphold harmony among fellow fans.
preview.by: By Royal Appointment of Princess Riko

quotes.title: 🗨️ Riko's Sweet Words & Cute Moments
quotes.description: We've collected Riko's sweetest lines, cutest reactions, and most memorable scenes! Watch again—they might be even funnier or more touching 😊
quotes.defeat_monsters: Riko will defeat all the monsters~
quotes.only_riko: I wish you'd only look at Riko~
quotes.healing_song: I know how much it means to be comforted by Riko's songs.
quotes.youre_hero: You can be the shining star and hero of your life too.
quotes.growing_riko: I’ll become a Riko who keeps growing!
quotes.happy_with_chico: I feel so happy when I'm with Chico!
quotes.no_more_anxiety: I'll make sure Riko won't feel anxious anymore.
quotes.see_your_heart: I'll try to truly see Chico's heart.
